structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

text.section:
Sec. 21-157. Same—Application and fee.
Each bus passenger bench shall require an application, permit, and fee and shall be issued a separate and distinct identification number by MDTA. The permits shall be renewable each year that the contract is in force and fees shall be paid annually.
No bench shall be installed at a bus stop prior to obtaining a permit.
When a bench is installed at a bus stop prior to obtaining a permit, the permittee shall be required by MDTA to pay a double permit fee.
